message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase a unique and valuable product. I believe you'll find it's worth every penny, but I'm willing to start with a competitive price of $2000000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $2000000 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $1500000. Can you meet me in the middle?

I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob, but I'm not willing to go all the way down to $1500000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I'm counteroffering at $1750000. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit far from my target. I'm willing to go up to $1600000. Can you meet me at this price?

I'm willing to make one more concession, Bob. I can see you're really interested in the product, and I want to make a deal. I'm counteroffering at $1650000. This is my final offer, and I'm confident you'll find it's a great value. What do you think?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still not quite there. I'm willing to go up to $1050000. Can you meet me at this price?
